SA20vmvkbh_u:6: lakṣaṇaṃ hy āvṛtis tatvaṃ pratipakṣasya bhāvanā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:7: tatra ca sthā phalaprāptir yānānuttaryam eva ca //
SA20vmvkbh_u:8: ity ete saptārthā hy asmiṃ cchāstre upadiśyante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:9: yad uta lakṣaṇaṃ āvaraṇaṃ tatvaṃ pratipakṣasya bhāvanā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:10: tasyām eva ca pratipakṣabhāvanāyām avasthā phalaprāptiś ca yānānuttatyañ ca saptamo 'rthaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:16: śūnyatā vidyate tv atra tasyām api sa vidyate // 1.1
SA20vmvkbh_u:21: tasyām api sa vidyata ity abhūtaparikalpaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:22_0: evaṃ yad yatra nāsti tat tena śūnyam iti yathābhūtaṃ samanupaśyati yat punar atrāvaśiṣṭaṃ
SA20vmvkbh_u:22_1: bhavati tat sad ihāstīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīty aviparītaṃ śūnyatālakṣaṇam udbhāvitaṃ bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:23: na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ tasmāt sarvaṃ vidhīyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:24: satvād asatvāt satvāc ca madhyamā pratipac ca sā // I.2
SA20vmvkbh_u:26: na cāśūnyaṃ dvayena grāhyena grāhakeṇa ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:29: vidhīyate nirdiśyate satvād abhūtaparikalpasya asatvād dvayasya satvāc ca śūnyatāyā abhūtaparikalpe tasyāṃ cābhūtaparikalpasya sā ca madhyamā pratipat /
SA20vmvkbh_u:32: evam ayaṃ pāṭhaḥ prajñāpāramitādiṣv anulomito bhavati sarvam idaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyam iti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:34: evam abhūtaparikalpasya sallakṣaṇam asallakṣaṇaṃ ca khyāpayitvā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:37: vijñānaṃ nāsti cāsyārthas tadabhāvāt tad apy asat // I.3
SA20vmvkbh_u:47: yat tadgrāhyaṃ rūpādipañcendriyaṃ manaḥ ṣaḍvijñānasaṃjñakaṃ caturvidhaṃ tasya grāhyasyārthasyābhāvāt tad api grāhakaṃ vijñānam asat /
SA20vmvkbh_u:50: yasmān na tathāsya bhāvo yathā pratibhāsa utpadyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:52: kimarthaṃ punas tasyābhāva eva neṣyate / yasmāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:54: anyathā na bandho na mokṣaḥ prasidhyed iti saṃkleśavyavadānāpavādadoṣaḥ syāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:56: evam abhūtaparikalpasya svalakṣaṇaṃ khyāpayitvā saṃgrahalakṣaṇaṃ khyāpayati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:57: abhūtaparikalpamātre sati yathā trayāṇāṃ svabhāvānāṃ saṃgraho bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:58: kalpitaḥ paratantraś ca pariniṣpanna eva ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:59: arthād abhūtakalpāc ca dvayābhāvāc ca deśitaḥ // I.5
SA20vmvkbh_u:73: tasmāc ca samatā jñeyā nopalambhopalambhayoḥ // I.7
SA20vmvkbh_u:74: upalabdher upalabdhitvenāsiddhatvād abhūtārthapratibhāsatayā tūpalabdhir ity ucyate 'nupalabdhisvabhāvāpi satī
SA20vmvkbh_u:81: tatrārthadṛṣṭir vijñānaṃ tadviśeṣe tu caitasāḥ // I.8
SA20vmvkbh_u:97: pūraṇāt triparicchedād upabhogāc ca karṣaṇāt // I.10
SA20vmvkbh_u:108: ābhimukhyād bhavena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ punarbhave vipākadānāyābhimukhīkaraṇāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:109: duḥkhanāj jātyā jarāmaraṇena ca parikliśyate jagat / so 'yaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:110: tredhā dvedhā ca saṃkleśaḥ saptadhābhūtakalpanāt // I.11
SA20vmvkbh_u:118: [Mvbh_22] tatra hetusaṃkleśaḥ kleśakarmasvabhāvair aṅgaiḥ phalasaṃkleśaś ca śeṣaiḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:135: piṇḍārthaḥ punar abhūtaparikalpasya navavidhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:145: evam abhūtaparikalpaṃ khyāpayitvā yathā śūnyatā vijñeyā tan nirdiśati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:146: lakṣaṇaṃ cātha paryāyas tadartho bheda eva ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:147: sādhanaṃ ceti vijñeyaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ samāsataḥ // I.12
SA20vmvkbh_u:150: dvayābhāvo hy abhāvasya bhāvaḥ śūnyasya lakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:152: tasya cābhāvasya bhāvaḥ śūnyatayā [Mvbh_23] lakṣaṇam ity abhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇatvaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:160: pṛthaktve sati dharmād anyā dharmateti na yujyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:162: ekatve sati viśuddhyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na syāt sāmānyalakṣaṇañ ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:167: dharmadhātuś ca paryāyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ samāsataḥ // I.14
SA20vmvkbh_u:186: yadā saha malena vartate tadā saṃkliṣṭā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:188: yadi samalā bhūtvā nirmalā bhavati kathaṃ vikāradharmiṇītvād anityā na bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:191: āgantukamalāpagamān na tu tasyāḥ svabhāvānyatvaṃ bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:213: tac ca yena yathā dṛṣṭaṃ yadarthaṃtasya śūnyatā // I.171
SA20vmvkbh_u:216: taddehas tayor bhoktṛbhojanayor yad adhiṣṭhānaṃ śarīraṃ [/
SA20vmvkbh_u:220: tac cādhyātmikāyatanādi yena śūnyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śūnyatājñānena [/
SA20vmvkbh_u:222: yathā ca dṛṣṭaṃ paramārthākāreṇa tasya śūnyatā paramārtha śūnyatā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:223: yadarthaṃ ca bodhisatvaḥ prapadyate tasya ca śūnyatā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:230: anavarāgrasya hi saṃsārasya śūnyatām apaśyan khinnaḥ saṃsāraṃ parityajeta /
SA20vmvkbh_u:232: nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇe 'pi yan nāvakirati notsṛjati tasya śūnyatā (/
SA20vmvkbh_u:240: evan tāvac caturdaśānāṃ śūnyatānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:243: tadabhāvasya sadbhāvas tasmin sā śūnyatāparā // I.20
SA20vmvkbh_u:253: saṃkliṣṭā ced bhaven nāsau muktāḥ syuḥ sarvadehinaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:254: viśuddhā ced bhaven nāsau vyāyāmo niṣphalo bhavet // I.21
SA20vmvkbh_u:255: yadi dharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā āgantukair upakleśair anutpanne [Mvbh_27] 'pi pratipakṣe na saṃkliṣṭā bhavet saṃkleśābhāvād ayatnata eva muktāḥ sarvasatvā bhaveyuḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:256: athotpanne 'pi pratipakṣe na viśuddhā bhavet mokṣārtham ārambho niṣphalo bhavet /
SA20vmvkbh_u:258: na kliṣṭā nāpi vākliṣṭā śuddhāśuddhā na caiva sā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:264: evaṃ śūnyatāyā uddiṣṭaḥ prabhedaḥ sādhito bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:285: tatra vyāpi kleśajñeyāvaraṇaṃ bodhisatvagotrakāṇāṃ kaṃ sākalyāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:289: saṃsārādānatyāgāvaraṇaṃ bodhisatvagotrakāṇām apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇāvaraṇād ity etad yathāyogam ubhayeṣām āvaraṇam ākhyātaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:302: tena hi pratikūlam api pratighavastu upekṣituṃ na śaknoti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:327: kin tad āvaraṇaṃ ke ca śubhādayaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:334: prakṛtyā caiva dauṣṭhulyaṃ kauśīdyaṃ ca pramāditā // II.6
SA20vmvkbh_u:335: saktir bhave ca bhoge ca līnacittatvam eva ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:343: eṣāṃ śubhādīnāṃ kasya katy āvaraṇāni jñeyānīty āha /
SA20vmvkbh_u:344: trīṇi trīṇi ca eteṣāṃ jñeyāny āvaraṇāni hi /
SA20vmvkbh_u:353: tasyāḥ prajñāne trīṇy āvaraṇāni pratipattivaidhuryaṃ kujanavāsaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:364: pariṇates trīṇi yair anyatra cittaṃ pariṇāmayati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:374: vaśitvasya trīṇi yair vibhutvaṃ na labhate [/
SA20vmvkbh_u:379: tat punar etad āvaraṇaṃ śubhādau yatrārthe daśa kāraṇāni tadarthādhikāreṇa veditavyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:382: sthitikāraṇaṃ tad yathā catvāra āhārāḥ satvānāṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:392: tad yathā suvarṇakārādayaḥ suvarṇādīnāṃ kaṭakādibhāvena pariṇatau /
SA20vmvkbh_u:418: ] tena punar utpāditabodhicittena kuśalamūlabalādhānaprāptena bodhisatvena viparyāsaṃ prahāya aviparyāsa utpāditavyaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:420: prahīṇāvaraṇena sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni /
SA20vmvkbh_u:422: tathānuttrastamānasena dharmeṣu guṇadarśinā pareṣāṃ te dharmā vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyās [/
SA20vmvkbh_u:423: ] tataḥ sa bodhisatva evaṃ vicitraguṇabalādhānaprāptaḥ kṣipram [Mvbh_33] anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāptavān sarvadharmavaśitām anuprāpnotīty eṣo 'nukramaḥ (/
SA20vmvkbh_u:445: hānivṛddhyoś ca doṣāṇāṃ guṇānām avatāraṇe // II.12
SA20vmvkbh_u:448: atra daśānāṃ pāramitānāṃ yasyāḥ pāramitāyāḥ yat phalaṃ tadāvaraṇena tasyā āvaraṇam udbhāvitaṃ bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:457: ] praṇidhānavaśena tadanukūlopapattiparigrahād [[] balapāramitāyās tasyaiva kuśalasya niyatīkaraṇāvaraṇaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:465: niṣparigrahatārthe ca santānābheda eva ca // II.14
SA20vmvkbh_u:470: dharmadhātau daśavidhe sarvatragādyarthe yad akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ tad daśasu bodhisatvabhūmiṣv āvaraṇaṃ yathākramaṃ tadvipakṣatvāt / yad uta
SA20vmvkbh_u:472: prathamayā hi bhūmyā dharmadhātoḥ sarvatragārthaṃ pratividhyati [/
SA20vmvkbh_u:475: ] yenāsyaivaṃ bhavati tasmāt tarhy asmābhiḥ samāne 'bhinirhāre sarvākārapariśodhanābhinirhāra eva yogaḥ karaṇīya iti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:477: yena dharmadhātuniṣyandasya śrutasyāgratāṃ viditvā tadarthaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrapramāṇāyām apy agnikhadāyām ātmānaṃ prakṣipet /
SA20vmvkbh_u:478: caturthyā niṣparigrahatārthan tathā hi dharmatṛṣṇāpi vyāvartate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:481: ) nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yaḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśudhyate veti prativedhāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:483: ] aṣṭamyāhīnānadhikārtham anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāt saṃkleśe vyavadāne vā [Mvbh_36] kasyacid dharmasya hānivṛddhyadarśanāc [/
SA20vmvkbh_u:484: ] caturdhā vaśitā nirvikalpavaśitā kṣetrapariśuddhivaśitā jñānavaśitā karmavaśitā ca [/
SA20vmvkbh_u:485: ] tatra prathamadvitīyavaśitāśrayatvaṃ dharmadhātāv aṣṭamyaiva bhūmyā pratividdhati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:491: sarvāṇy āvaraṇānīha yatkṣayān muktir iṣyate // II.17
SA20vmvkbh_u:502: hetvāvaraṇaṃ yac chubhādau daśavidhahetvarthādhikārāt i tatvapraveśāvaraṇaṃ yad bodhipakṣyeṣu /
SA20vmvkbh_u:511: phalahetumayan tatvaṃ sūkṣmaudārikam eva ca // III. 1
SA20vmvkbh_u:514: ity etad daśavidhaṃ tatvaṃ yad uta mūlatatvaṃ lakṣaṇatatvaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:535: asac ca nityaṃ sac cāpy atatvataḥ
SA20vmvkbh_u:537: parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ nityam asad ity etat parikalpitasvabhāve tatvam aviparītatvāt [/
SA20vmvkbh_u:538: ] paratantralakṣaṇaṃ sac ca na ca tatvato bhrāntatvād ity etat paratantrasvabhāve tatvaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:544: grāhyagrāhakayoś cāpi bhāvābhāve ca darśanaṃ // III.4
SA20vmvkbh_u:545: yajjñānān na pravarteta tad dhi tatvasya lakṣaṇaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:546: pudgaladharmayoḥ samāropāpavādadarśanaṃ yasya jñānān na pravartate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:548: grāhyagrāhakayoḥ samāropāpavādadarśanaṃ yasya jñānān na pravartate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:552: etan mūlatatve lakṣaṇam aviparītaṃ lakṣaṇatatvam ity ucyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:568: abhāvaś cāpy atadbhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ śūnyatā matā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:569: parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ na kenacit prakāreṇāstīty abhāva evāsya śūnyatā paratantralakṣaṇaṃ tathā nāsti yathā parikalpyate na tu sarvathā nāstīti tasyātadbhāvaḥ (/
SA20vmvkbh_u:571: ] pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvam eveti prakṛtir evāsya śūnyatā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:572: alakṣaṇaṃ ca nairātmyaṃ tadvilakṣaṇam eva ca // III.7
SA20vmvkbh_u:574: parikalpitasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇam eva nāstīty alakṣaṇam evāsya nairātmyaṃ [/
SA20vmvkbh_u:575: ] paratantrasyāsti lakṣaṇaṃ na tu yathā parikalpyata iti tadvilakṣaṇam asya lakṣaṇan nairātmyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:576_0: pariniṣpannas tu svabhāvo nairātmyam eveti prakṛtir evāsya nairātmyam iti trividhe
SA20vmvkbh_u:576_1: mūlatatve trividhānityatā paridīpitā asadarthānityatā utpādabhaṅgānityatā samalanirmalānityatā ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:577: trividhā duḥkhatā upādānaduḥkhatā lakṣaṇaduḥkhatā saṃbandhaduḥkhatā [Mvbh_40] ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:578: trividhā śūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatā atadbhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā ca trividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ alakṣaṇanairātmyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:587: vāsanātha samutthānam avisaṃyoga eva ca // III.8
SA20vmvkbh_u:594: svabhāvānutpattir grāhyagrāhakayor anutpattir malaśāntidvayaṃ ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhatathatākhyam ity eṣa trividho nirodho yad uta svabhāvanirodho dvayanirodhaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:597: parijñāyāṃ prahāṇe ca prāptisākṣātkṛtāv ayaṃ [//] III.9
SA20vmvkbh_u:600: parikalpitasya parijñāne paratantrasya parijñāne prahāṇe ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:601: pariniṣpannasya parijñāne prāptisākṣātkaraṇe ca evam atra parijñāprahāṇasākṣātkriyāyāṃ mārgasatyavyavasthānam iti veditavyaṃ [/]
SA20vmvkbh_u:603: audārikasūkṣmatatvaṃ punaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyaṃ tan mūlatatve kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:615: arthaparamārthas tathatā paramasya jñānasyārtha iti kṛtvā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:616: prāptiparamārtho nirvāṇaṃ paramo 'rtha iti kṛtvā pratipattiparamārtho mārgaḥ paramo 'syārtha iti kṛtvā [/
SA20vmvkbh_u:623: saṃskṛtaṃ mārgasatyasaṃgṛhītam aviparyāsapariniṣpattyā punar jñeyavastuny [Mvbh_42] aviparyāsāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:630: yasmin vastuni saṃketasaṃstavānupraviṣṭayā buddhyā sarveṣāṃ laukikānāṃ darśanatulyatā bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:631: pṛthivy eveyaṃ nāgnī rūpam evedaṃ na śabda ity evamādi /
SA20vmvkbh_u:633: yat satāṃ yuktārthapaṇḍitānāṃ tārkikāṇāṃ pramāṇatrayaṃ niśrityopapattisādhanayuktyā prasiddhaṃ vastu /
SA20vmvkbh_u:637: viśuddhigocaraṃ dvedhā ekasmād eva kīrtitaṃ // III.12
SA20vmvkbh_u:638: pariniṣpannād eva svabhāvān na hy anyasvabhāvo viśuddhijñānadvayagocaro bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:642: yathāyogaṃ pañca vastūny ārabhya nimittavikalpayoḥ paratantreṇa [Mvbh_43] saṃgrahaḥ nāmnaḥ parikalpitena /
SA20vmvkbh_u:653: anavarāgreṣv eti saṃsāraḥ tathatācittasaṃkleśāt satvāḥ saṃkliśyanta iti sarvaṃ duḥkhādisatyaṃ ca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ)
SA20vmvkbh_u:654: yaiva ca sandhinirmocanasūtre saptavidhā tathatā nirdiṣṭā / tatra /
SA20vmvkbh_u:671: yasya pratipakṣeṇa daśavidhaṃ kauśalyaṃ yad utaikatvagrāho hetutvagrāho bhoktṛtvagrāhaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:680: trividhaṃ rūpaṃ parikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ yo rūpasya parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:684: yathā rūpam evaṃ vedanādayaḥ skandhāḥ dhātvāyatanādayaś ca yojyāḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:685: evan triṣu svabhāveṣu skandhādīnām antarbhāvād daśavidhaṃ kauśalyatatvaṃ mūlatatva eva draṣṭavyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:692: āditas tāvat skandhās te trividhenārthena veditavyāḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:693: anekatvārthena yat kiñcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam iti vistaraḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:696: rāśyartho hi skandhārtha evaṃ ca loke rāśyartho dṛṣṭa iti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:711: tatra hetu sa nāropaḥ saṃskārādīnāṃ viṣamahetukalpanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:712: [Mvbh_46] hetvapavādo nirhetukatvakalpanāt phalasamāropaḥ sātmakānāṃ saṃskārādīnām avidyādipratyayapravṛttikalpanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:713: phalāpavādo na santy avidyādipratyayāḥ saṃskārādaya iti kalpanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:714: kriyāsamāropo 'vidyādīnāṃ saṃskārādyutpattau vyāpārakalpanāt kriyāpavādo niḥsāmarthyakalpanāt tadabhāvād asamāropānapavādo veditavyaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:719: tatrāniṣṭe pāratantryaṃ duścaritenānicchato 'pi durgatigamanād iṣṭe pāratantryaṃ sucaritena sugatigamanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:720_0: viśuddhau pāratantryaṃ pañca nivaraṇāny aprahāya yāvat saptabodhyaṅgāny abhāvayitvā
SA20vmvkbh_u:720_1: duḥkhasyāntākaraṇāt samotpattau pāratantryaṃ dvayor apūrvācaramayos tathāgatayoś
SA20vmvkbh_u:720_2: cakravartinoś caikasmin lokadhātāv anutpādād ādhipatye pāratantryaṃ striyāś cakravartitvādyakaraṇāt
SA20vmvkbh_u:720_3: saṃprāptau pāratantryaṃ striyāḥ pratyekānuttarabodhyanabhisaṃbodhāt samudācāre pāratantryaṃ
SA20vmvkbh_u:720_4: dṛṣṭisaṃpannasya vadhādyupakramāsamudācārāt pṛthagjanasya ca samudācārād vistareṇa
SA20vmvkbh_u:725: grahaṇārthena yāvad viśuddhidvayārthena teṣu tadādhipatyād rūpādiviṣayagrahaṇe hi cakṣurādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām ādhipatyaṃ sthāne jīvitendriyasya tadādhipatyenāmaraṇāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:726: kulasandhāne strīpuruṣendriyayor apatyaprasavādhipatyād upabhoge vedanendriyāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalakarmaphalopabhogāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:731: kim aparam adhvatrayaṃ yathāyogaṃ phalahetūpayogārthenātīto 'dhvā phalahetvanupayogārthenānāgato 'dhvā hetūpayogaphalānupayogārthena pratyutpanno 'dhvā veditavyaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:736: tatra duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanāsanimittārthena yat kiñcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti kṛtvā vedanānimittaṃ punar vedanāsthānīyā dharmā veditavyāḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:747: tenaiva svayam aśrutvā parato niryāṇārthena pratyekabuddhayānaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:748: avikalpena jñānena svayaṃ niryāṇārthena mahāyānaṃ veditavyaṃ //
SA20vmvkbh_u:751: nimittāt praśamāt sārthāt paścimaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ // III.22
SA20vmvkbh_u:752: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ tatra saprajñaptir nāmakāyādayaḥ hetur bījasaṃgṛhītam ālayavijñānaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:755: etat saprajñaptisahetukaṃ nimittaṃ sasaṃprayogaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:758: ) tasya vikalpakatvād asaṃskṛtaṃ punaḥ praśamaś ca nirodhaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:759: praśamārthaś ca tathatā tatra praśamo nirodho mārgaś ca yaś ca praśamo yena ceti kṛtvā praśamārthaḥ tathatā praśamasyārtha iti kṛtvā tathatāyā mārgālambanatvāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:761: ity etenārthena skandhādiṣu jñānaṃ skandhādikauśalyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:766: dṛśyatatvaṃ ca tatrādarśatatvaṃ mūlatatvaṃ tatra śeṣāṇāṃ darśanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:791: tayā sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ vastv āryā duḥkhataḥ paśyantīti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:793: ātmābhiniveśavastu cittaṃ tatparīkṣayā nirodhasatyam avataraty ātmocchedabhayāpagamāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:799: parijñāte vipakṣe ca pratipakṣe ca sarvathā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:801: smṛtyupasthānabhāvanayā vipakṣe pratipakṣe ca sarvaprakāraṃ parijñāte vipakṣāpagamāya pratipakṣopagamāya ca vīryañ caturdhā saṃpravartate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:802: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāyeti vistaraḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:808: ) karmaṇyatā catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ sarvārthasamṛddhihetutvāt sthitir atra cittasthitiḥ samādhir veditavyaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:814: asaṃskāro 'tha saṃskāraḥ pañca doṣā ime matāḥ // IV.4
SA20vmvkbh_u:819: eṣāṃ prahāṇāya katham aṣṭau prahāṇasaṃskārā vyavasthāpyante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:820: catvāraḥ kausīdyaprahāṇāya cchandavyāyāmaśraddhāprasrabdhayas te punar yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:821: āśrayo 'thāśritas tasya nimittaṃ phalam eva ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:823: āśrito vyāyāmas tasyāśrayasya cchandasya nimittaṃ śraddhā saṃpratyaye (/
SA20vmvkbh_u:824_0: ) saty abhilāṣāt tasyāśritasya vyāyāmasya phalaṃ prasrabdhir ārabdhavīryasya samādhiviśeṣādhigamāc
SA20vmvkbh_u:824_2: doṣāṇāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pratipakṣās te punaḥ smṛtyādayo veditavyā yathākramaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:827: smṛtir ālambane 'saṃpramoṣaḥ saṃprajanyaṃ smṛtyasaṃpramoṣe sati layauddhatyānubodhaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:831: ṛddhipādānām anantaraṃ pañcendriyāṇi śraddhādīni teṣāṃ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:835: ṛddhipādaiḥ karmaṇyacittasyāropite mokṣabhāgīye kuśalamūle cchandādhipatyataḥ prayogādhipatyataḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:841: tāny eva śraddhādīni balavanti balānīty ucyante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:845: yadā tāny aśraddhādibhir vipakṣair na vyavakīryante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:852: avaropitamokṣabhāgīyasyendriyāṇy uktāny atha nirvedhabhāgīyāni kim indriyāvasthāyāṃ veditavyāny āhosvid balāvasthāyāṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:853: dvau dvau nirvedhabhāgīyāv indriyāṇi balāni ca // IV.7
SA20vmvkbh_u:859: caturtham anuśaṃsāṅgan niḥkleśāṅgaṃ tridhā mataṃ // IV.8
SA20vmvkbh_u:876: bhāvanāmārge 'sya paricchedāṅgaṃ samyagdṛṣṭir laukikī lokottarapṛṣṭhalabdhā yayā svādhigamaṃ paricchinatti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:879: parasaṃbhāvanāṅgaṃ tridhā samyagvākkarmāntājīvās tair hi yathākramaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:880: dṛṣṭau śīle 'tha saṃlekhe paravijñaptir iṣyate // IV.10
SA20vmvkbh_u:881: tasya samyagvācā kathāsāṃkathyaviniścayena prajñāyāṃ saṃbhāvanā bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:882: samyakkarmāntena śīle 'kṛtyākaraṇāt samyagājīvena saṃlekhe dharmeṇa mātrayā ca cīvarādyanveṣaṇāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:887: upakleśo layauddhatyaṃ [Mvbh_55] vibhutvavipakṣaś ca vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhāravibandhaḥ tatra prathamasya samyagvyāyāmaḥ pratipakṣas tena mārgabhāvanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:894: viparyastāpi aviparyāsānukūlāviparyastā viparyāsānubandhā aviparyastā viparyāsaniranubandhā ca yathākramaṃ pṛthagjanaśaikṣāśaikṣāvasthāsu /
SA20vmvkbh_u:898: bodhisatvānāṃ svaparasāntānikāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā anityādibhir ākāraiḥ kāyādīn manasikurvanti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:900: śrāvakapratyekabuddhāḥ smṛtyupasthānādīni bhāvayanti yāvad eva kāyādīnāṃ visaṃyogāya /
SA20vmvkbh_u:911: adhimuktau praveśe ca niryāṇe vyākṛtāv api /
SA20vmvkbh_u:914: tatra hetvavasthā yā gotrasthasya pudgalasyāvatārāvasthā utpāditabodhicittasya prayogāvasthā cittotpādād ūrdham aprāpte phale /
SA20vmvkbh_u:920: anuttarāvasthā buddhasya tata ūrdham avasthābhāvād adhimuktyavasthā bodhisatvānāṃ sarvasyām adhimukticaryābhūmau /
SA20vmvkbh_u:921: praveśāvasthā prathamāyāṃ bhūmau niryāṇāvasthā taduttarāsu ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣu /
SA20vmvkbh_u:922: vyākaraṇāvasthā aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau kathikatvāvasthā navamyām abhiṣekāvasthā daśamyāṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:928: aśuddhāśuddhaśuddhā ca viśuddhā ca yathārhataḥ // IV.15
SA20vmvkbh_u:929: tatrāśuddhāvasthā hetvavasthām upādāya yāvat prayogād aśuddhaśuddhāvasthā [Mvbh_57] śaikṣāṇāṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:933: ) veditavyam ayaṃ gotrastho 'yam avatīrṇa ity evamādi /
SA20vmvkbh_u:938: rucir vṛddhir viśuddhiś ca phalam etad yathākramaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:945: vipākaphalam adhipatiphalan niṣyandaphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalañ ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:946: uttarottaram ādyañ ca tadabhyāsāt samāptitaḥ // IV.17
SA20vmvkbh_u:948: uttarānuttaratvāc ca phalam anyat samāsataḥ // IV.18
SA20vmvkbh_u:949: uttarottaraphalaṃ gotrāc cittotpāda ity evamādi paraṃparayā veditavyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:956: visaṃyogaphalaṃ nirodhasākṣātkriyā abhyāsaphalaṃ samāptiphalaṃ ca kleśavisaṃyogaḥ [Mvbh_58] śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:959: etāni catvāri abhyāsasamāptiphalaprabheda eva etad anyat phalaṃ samāsanirdeśato vyāsatas tv aparimāṇaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:966: sottarā bhāvanā niruttarā ca bhāvanā yālambanamanaskāraprāptiviśiṣṭā //
SA20vmvkbh_u:974: phalānāṃ piṇḍārthaḥ saṃgrahataḥ tadviśeṣataḥ pūrvābhyāsataḥn uttarottaranirhārataḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:981: uddeśataḥ uttarottaraphalādīni catvāri nirdeśataḥ ānukūlyaphalādini ṣaṭ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:988: ānuttaryaṃ prapattau hi punar ālambane mataṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:990: trividham ānuttaryaṃ mahāyāne yenaitad anuttaraṃ yānaṃ pratipattyānuttaryaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:999: ity eṣā ṣaḍvidhā pratipattir yad uta paramā pratipattiḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1008: nairantaryam akṛcchratvaṃ vittatvaṃ ca parigrahaḥ // V.3
SA20vmvkbh_u:1011: yad utaudāryaparamatā āyatatvaparamatā adhikāraparamatā akṣayatvaparamatā nairantaryaparamatā akṛcchratvaparamatā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1020: ārambhaparamatādhimukticaryābhūmāv adhimātrāyāṃ kṣāntau pratilambhaparamatā prathamāyāṃ bhūmau /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1025: tataś ca paramārthena daśa pāramitā matāḥ // V.4
SA20vmvkbh_u:1026: yata eṣā dvādaśavidhā paramatā etāsu saṃvidyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1027: tataḥ paramā [Mvbh_62] ity anenārthena daśa pāramitāḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1029: dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamā vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1030: praṇidhānaṃ balaṃ jñānam etāḥ pāramitā daśeti // V.5
SA20vmvkbh_u:1032: anugraho 'vighātaś ca karma tasya ca marṣaṇaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1034: akṣayatvaṃ sadā vṛttir niyataṃ bhogapācane // V.6
SA20vmvkbh_u:1044: sarvajanmasu buddhotpādārāgaṇato dānādiṣu sadā pravartate balapāramitayā pratisaṃkhyānabhāvanābalābhyāṃ niyataṃ dānādiṣu pravartate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1054: dānādīny adhikṛtya yathāprajñaptānāṃ sūtrādidharmāṇāṃ mahāyāne manasikaraṇam abhīkṣṇaṃ śrutacintābhāvanāmayyā prajñayā manasikārapratipattiḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1055: sā triprakārayā prajñayā manasikriyā kaṃ guṇaṃkaroti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1060: saṃyuktā dharmacaritaiḥ sā jñeyā daśabhiḥ punaḥ // V.8
SA20vmvkbh_u:1062: daśabhir dharmacaritaiḥ parigṛhītā veditavyā katamad daśadhā dharmacaritaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1064: prakāśanātha svādhyāyaś cintanā bhāvanā ca tat // V.9
SA20vmvkbh_u:1065: mahāyānasya lekhanaṃ pūjanaṃ parebhyo dānaṃ pareṇa vācyamānasya śravaṇaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1072: kasmān mahāyāna eva dharmacaritam atyarthaṃ mahāphalan deśyate sūtreṣu na punaḥ śrāvakayāne /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1093: sa eṣa kiṃlakṣaṇo veditavya ity ata āha /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1097: hīnacittaṃca vikṣepaḥ parijñeyo hi dhīmatā // V.12
SA20vmvkbh_u:1098: ity evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ ṣaḍvidho vikṣepo yo bodhisatvena parijñeyaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1099: tatra vyutthānaṃ samādhitaḥ pañcabhir vijñānakāyaiḥ prakṛtivikṣepaḥ viṣaye visāro bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1108: tatrāviparyāso daśavidhe vastuni veditavyaḥ / yad uta /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1112: saṃyogāt saṃstavāc caiva viyogād apy asaṃstavāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1113: arthasatvam asatvañ ca vyañjane so 'viparyayaḥ /] V.14
SA20vmvkbh_u:1114: saṃyoge sati vyañjanānām avicchinnoccāraṇatayā asya cedaṃ nāmeti saṃstavāt sārthakatvaṃ viparyayān nirarthakatvam iti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1118: arthe sa cāviparyāsaḥ sadasatvena varjitaḥ // V.15
SA20vmvkbh_u:1122: arthe yad darśanaṃ sa tatrāviparyāsaḥ arthasya satvena varjito grāhyagrāhakābhāvād asatvena varjitaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1126: grāhyagrāhakajalpaparibhāvito jalpamanaskāras tasya grāhyagrāhakavikalpasyāśrayo bhavatīty ayaṃ manaskāre 'viparyāsaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1127: katamasmin manaskāre grāhyagrāhakasaṃprakhyānakāraṇe sa hy asau jalpamanaskāro 'bhilāpasaṃjñāparibhāvitatvāt grāhyagrāhakavikalpāśrayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1128: māyādivad asatvañ ca satvaṃ cārthasya tan mataṃ [/]
SA20vmvkbh_u:1130: yat tad arthasyāsatvaṃ satvaṃ cānantaram uktaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1131: tan māyādivan mataṃ yathā māyā na hastyādibhāvenāsti na ca naivāsti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1133: evam artho 'pi na cāsti yathā saṃprakhyāti grāhyagrāhakatvena na ca naivāsti tadbhrāntimātrāstitvāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1134_0: ādiśabdena marīcisvapnodakacandrādayo dṛṣṭāntā yathāyogaṃ veditavyā iti yan māyādyupamārthe
SA20vmvkbh_u:1134_1: darśanād avisāraṃ cetasaḥ paśyati so 'visāre 'viparyāsas tena bhāvābhāvayoś cittasyāvisaraṇāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1139: yad idaṃ cakṣūrūpaṃ yāvan manodharmā iti yaj jñānaṃ sarvavikalpānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ayaṃ svalakṣaṇe 'viparyāsaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1142: saṃvṛtyā tu nedaṃ nāmamātram iti gṛhyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1144: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tasmāt sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.19
SA20vmvkbh_u:1145: na hi dharmanairātmyena vinā kaścid dharmo vidyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1146: tasmād dharmadhātuḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇam iti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1149: tadaśuddhir viśuddhiś ca sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.20
SA20vmvkbh_u:1150: viparyastasmanaskārāprahāṇan tasya dharmadhātor aviśuddhis tatprahāṇaṃ viśuddhir iti yad evaṃjñānam ayam aviśuddhau viśuddhau cāviparyāso yathākramaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1152: dvayasyāgantukatvaṃ hi sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.21
SA20vmvkbh_u:1155: dvayam apy etad āgantukam aviśuddhiru viśuddhiś ca paścād iti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1158: saṃkleśaś ca viśuddhiś ca dharmapudgalayor na hi /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1160: na hi pudgalasya saṃkleśo na viśuddhir nāpi dharmasya /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1161: yasmān na pudgalo 'sti na dharmo yataś ca na kasyacit saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ ato na saṃkleśapakṣe kasyacid dhāniḥ na vyavadānapakse kasyacid viśeṣaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1162: yatas trāso vā syād unnatir vety ayam atrāse 'nunnatau cāviparyāsaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1164: ete ca daśāviparyāsā daśasu vajrapadeṣu yathākramaṃ yojayitavyāḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1167: āśrayo māyopamatā avikalpanatā prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1177: ta eva avikalpanato yena ca na vikalpayati nirvikalpena jñānena yac ca na vikalpayati prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1179: yad uta tribhiḥ svabhāvair avikalpanatayā ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1182: yady ete parikalpitaparatantralakṣaṇā dharmā na saṃvidyante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1184: atha saṃvidyante dharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā na [Mvbh_69] yujyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1186: yathā māyākṛtaṃ na vidyata upalabhyate ca yadi prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā dharmāṇāṃ tat kathaṃ pūrvaṃ saṃkleśaḥ paścād vyavadānaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1191: yady aprameyabuddhotpāde saty aprameyāṇāṃ satvānāṃ kleśāpaśamaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1192: tat kathaṃ na saṃsārasamucchedo na nirvāṇavṛddhir bhavati /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1196: yatra yā ca yato bhrāntir abhrāntir yā ca yatra ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1197: bhrāntyabhrāntiphale caiva paryantaś ca tayor iti //
SA20vmvkbh_u:1199: akalpanā prakṛtyā ca bhāsvaratvaṃ sadaiva hi //
SA20vmvkbh_u:1204: antadvayavarjane pratipattiḥ katamā yā ratnakūṭe madhyamā pratipattir upadiṣṭā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1210: vikalpadvayatāntaś ca sa ca saptavidho mataḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1217: ekatvam ity antaḥ tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipat /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1219: yāvan na mānavapratyavekṣā ātmadarśane hi jīvas tac charīraṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1220: anyo jīvo 'nyac charīram iti bhavati darśanaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1223: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yā rūpādīnāṃ na nityapratyavekṣā nānityapratyavekṣā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1224: ātmeti pudgalasamāropāntaḥ nairātmyam ity apavādāntaḥ prajñaptisato 'py apavādāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1225: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad ātmanairātmyayor madhyaṃ nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1226: bhūtaṃ cittam iti dharmasamāropāntaḥ abhūtam ity apavādāntaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1227: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yatra na cittaṃ na cetanā na mano na vijñānaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1229: kuśalādayo vyavadānam iti pratipakṣāntas tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yo 'syāntadvayasyānupagamo 'nudāhāro 'pravyāhāraḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1230: astīti śāśvatāntas tayor eva pudgaladharmayor nāstīty ucchedāntas tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad anayor dvayor antayor madhyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1232: evaṃ vidyā saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca tatpratipakṣaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1233: yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ cety antas tannirodho grāhyo grāhako vety anto yena mārgeṇa tan nirudhyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1234_1: madhyamā pratipad vidyā cāvidyā cādvayam etad iti vistareṇa vidyāvidyādīnāṃ grāhyagrāhakatvābhāvāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1241: yasya pratipakṣo jñānaśūnyatā jñānānimittaṃ jñānāpraṇihitaṃ ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1246: punarbhavaprabandhaś ca yasya pratipakṣo jñānājātiḥ jñānānutpādo jñānāsvabhāvatā ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1249: jñeyaśūnyatādayo dharmā etena trividhena saṃkleśena yathāyogaṃ yāvan na śūnyatādayaḥ kriyante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1250: prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādayo dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt tena yadi dharmadhātuḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśudhyate veti kalpayaty ayam antaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1253: yan na śūnyatayā dharmāñ chūnyāṃ karoti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1254: api tu dharmā eva śūnyā ity evamādi /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1255: aparaḥ saptavidho vikalpadvayāntas tad yathā bhāve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ/
SA20vmvkbh_u:1256: abhāve 'pi pudgalo 'sti yasya vināśāya śūnyatā [Mvbh_72] nairātmyam api vā nāstīti kalpanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1257: tad etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham iyaṃ madhyamā pratipat /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1258: na khalu pudgalavināśāya śūnyatā api tu śūnyataiva śūnyā pūrvāntaśūnyatā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1261: śamane 'pi vikalpo 'nataḥ praheyaprahāṇakalpanayā śūnyatāyās trasanād etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham ākāśadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1262: trāsye 'pi vikalpo 'ntas tataś ca trāsyād bhaye 'pi parikalpitarūpāditrasanāt (/
SA20vmvkbh_u:1264: pūrvako dṛṣṭāntaḥ śrāvakān ārabhyāyaṃ tu bodhisatvān /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1265: grāhye 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ grāhake 'pi etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ māyākāradṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1269: arthābhāve vijñaptyasaṃbhavād ity etad atra sādharmyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1270: samyaktve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ mithyātve 'pi bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ samyaktvena kalpayato mithyātvena vā etasyāntadvayasya parivarjanārthaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1273_0: jātaś ca tad eva kāṣṭhadvayaṃ dahaty evam asamyaktvalakṣaṇāyā yathābhūtapratyavekṣāyāḥ
SA20vmvkbh_u:1273_1: samyaktvalakṣaṇam āryaṃ prajñendriyaṃ jāyate jātaṃ ca tām eva bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ vibhāvayatīty
SA20vmvkbh_u:1273_2: etad atra sādharmyaṃ na cāsamyaktvalakṣaṇāpi bhūtapratyavekṣā mithyātvalakṣaṇā samyaktvānukūlyāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1275: avyāpṛtāv api jñānasya buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ niḥsāmarthyaṃ vā kalpayataḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1278_0: ajanmatve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ samakālatve 'pi yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā kalpayati
SA20vmvkbh_u:1278_1: saṃkleśasyaiva vā dīrghakālatvam etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ dvitīyas
SA20vmvkbh_u:1282: viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca jñeyā daśasu bhūmiṣu /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1283: yasyāṃ bhūmau yā pāramitātiriktatarā sā tatra viśiṣṭā sarvāsu ca sarvatra samudāgacchatīty aviśiṣṭā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1290: pragamaḥ praśaṭhatvaṃ ca prakarṣālambanaṃ mataṃ // V.28
SA20vmvkbh_u:1292: yad uta dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānālambanaṃ dharmadhātvālambanaṃ sādhyālambanaṃ sādhanālambanaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1299: tatra prathamaṃ ye pāramitādayo dharmā vyavasthāpyante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1300: dvitīyan tathatā tṛtīyacaturthe te eva yathākramaṃ dharmadhātuprativedhena pāramitādidharmādhigamāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1309: ekādaśam aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau dvādaśaṃ navamyādibhūmitraye tad eva hi prathamadvayaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1310: tasyān tasyām avasthāyāṃ tattadālambanaṃ nāma labhate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1332: madhyamāpratipatprakāśanāt madhyāntavibhāgam apy etan madhyasyāntayoś ca prakāśanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1347: sā ca pratipattir yādṛśī paramā / yena ca
SA20vmvkbh_u:1350: yathā yena prakāreṇāvikṣepapariṇatā ca śamathabhāvanayā aviparyāsapariṇatā ca vipaśyanābhāvanayā/
SA20vmvkbh_u:1351: yadarthaṃ ca madhyamayā pratipadā niryāṇārthaṃ / yatra ca
SA20vmvkbh_u:1367: // vyākhyām imām upanibadhya yad asti puṇyaṃ
SA20vmvkbh_u:1370: bodhitrayaṃ ca na cirāj jagad aśnuvīta //
